page.title: 13BURRINGTON COMRADES' CLUB
page.content:
The{Men's Club, formerly Comrades {Club,}meets on Monday and Thursday in the winter.There is{a skittle alley, } and a league of 11 skittle teams. There is a{billiard room}with full size table.{Table tennis,darts and {Pool}are also played.There has been an{Annual Dinner}since 1920 when Mr. Short won a turkey in the skittle competition and shared it with the comrades.This year's guest speaker was Mr.Andrews, Chairman of the N.D.D.C. { {OVER-SIXTIES.}
The over sixties meet every fortnight on a Thursday.There are 16-20 members. They play skittles,cards and Bingo. They also go on coach trips.
